title: Grammys Gift Bag Worth $30,000 - 2017 Grammy Awards Swag for Presenters, Performers, Guests
text:
If you're lucky enough to get to go to the Grammys, you don't just get a chance to walk the red carpet in a glamorous outfit and check out amazing performances on stage. You also get to walk away with a ton of fancy gifts, too. Los Angeles marketing firm Distinctive Assets has provided Grammy gift bags for nearly two decades, and the price tag grows every single year. Last year , the swag bag was worth a whopping $22,000, and this year, that number has gone up to $30,000. But according to the Daily Mail , some stars don't accept the gift bag because they have to pay taxes on its value. The gifts are distributed at various points: at a Gift Lounge open during three full days of rehearsals at the Staples Center, in preassembled gift bags to presenters and performers, and smaller goodie bags given to guests.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The perks inside are incredible. Here are just a few of the most opulent items on offer:
A 10-year supply of Oxygentix Breathable Foundation and Oxygenated Moisturizer, worth up to $13,400 A weeklong trip to the Golden Door spa, worth $8,850 One year's supply of Healing Saint luminosity skin serum and hair follicle stimulant, worth $2,316 Lauren Ashtyn Full Volume hair extensions, worth $850 An Oomi smart-home kit, worth $599 The cheapest item on the list is totally accessible, thoughâ€”a ChapStick lip balm that retails at $4.99. Stars, they're just like us.
